title: [垃圾利] 米杜士堡 對 利物浦

replies.msg:
15/12 03:45am
Middlesbrough vs Liverpool

Joe Gomez has travelled with the Liverpool squad to Middlesbrough ahead of Wednesday night's Premier League clash at the Riverside.

Liverpool

Midfielder Emre Can remains a doubt after missing Sunday's draw with West Ham because of a minor knee injury.

Centre-back Dejan Lovren came off with cramp at half-time in that match and will have to be assessed before the game at the Riverside.

Midfielder Marko Grujic is sidelined with a tendon injury while striker Daniel Sturridge will not be considered but could return to the squad for Monday's Merseyside derby at Goodison Park if his return from a calf problem remains on schedule.

Provisional squad: Karius, Clyne, Matip, Klavan, Milner, Lallana, Henderson, Wijnaldum, Mane, Origi, Firmino, Mignolet, Alexander-Arnold, Moreno, Lucas, Stewart, Ejaria, Woodburn.

今場要生生性性
再輸前四都冇埋
